DOC.brief_title: TPC v PF Induction Chemotherapy Combined With CCRT Stage IVa-b Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , parallel , randomized , open label , multicenter phase III clinical trial compare survival toxicity TPC VS PF induction chemotherapy combine CCRT stage IVa-b nasopharyngeal carcinoma patient endemic area.The primary endpoint failure free survival ( FFS）.The secondary endpoint overall survival ( OS） , progression-free survival（PFS） , local-regionally relapse free survival ( LRFS ) , distant metastasis free survival（DMFS ) toxicity .
